tool.name: CopyDataToServer

param.name: in_data
param.dialogReference: The input discharge dataset including the discharge table, and/or drainage line features

param.name: in_workspace
param.dialogReference: The input workspace on the server machine where the data copies are made. The workspace could be SQL server database or file geodatabase.

tool.summary: Copies the discharge table and/or the drainage line features to the ArcGIS server machine from the author/publisher machine.
tool.usage:
• This tool is an automation of copying discharge table and drainage line features and adding attribute index in order to create and register the database on the server machine.

  • The indexed attributes include COMID and TimeValue in Discharge_Table, and COMID in the drainage line feature classes. All indexes are added seperately.

  • The workspace on server machine must be of the same type as the database of the input discharge dataset on author/publisher machine.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Copies the discharge table and/or the drainage line features to the ArcGIS server machine from the author/publisher machine.
